title: Another Deranged Routine: Exercise
itunes:title: Another Deranged Routine: Exercise
description:
Ku and Su are back on that routine train. This week the two talk about everything they use for exercise – their outfits, their equipment, their gym setups. Now, this is Ku and Su we’re talking about here so of course, this includes things like a sweet tiger decal and nasal spray (alongside excellent recommendations.) Get ready to get your sweat on for this one. 

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

 

  • Things that Kulap is wearing to workout:
    • Panache Sports Bra
    • Alo shorts or leggings
    • bombas socks
    • slouchy socks for an alternative lewk with leggins
    • Kulap bought Hoka's
  • Things that SuChin is wearing for walkersons:
    • Som Som Drink Crossbody Bag
    • Abby's Best Hat Ever
    • Best Hat Ever Visory version
  • Speaking of Abby Arad, make sure you check out her Amazon store
  • Su’s two favorite nasal sprays are Neil Med nasal spray and xclear nasal spray
  • Kulap loves ProBoxing Supplies. She has hand Wraps, gloves, a free-standing bag, a hanging bag, and New Focus mitts from there!
  • In Kualps gym she has this shoe rack, her Tiger decal, and a wall of champions
  • Using the OfferUp app, Ku bought some bumper weights to add to her gym collection, including her matte black Olympic bar
  • SuChin loves using the Down Dog app and has dabbled in pilates with the Mind and Motion Pilates app!

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 

 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
